subject: California Chrome (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: From 1997 to 2005, Visa USA offered a $5 million reward to any horse that could claim racing’s Triple Crown. But none did.
snippet: From 1997 to 2005, Visa USA offered a $5 million reward to any horse that could claim racing’s Triple Crown. But none did.
